languages.text: "Да за что! Ваша Светлость, там и разбираться не станут, к стенке поставят и все тут!" {n}Солдат понуро опускает голову, смиряясь с судьбой.{/n}

"Why, what did I do? Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship, they won't even bother to look into the matter, they'll just march me to the wall and shoot me!" {n}The soldier lowers his head glumly, accepting his fate.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Да за что! Ваша Светлость, там и разбираться не станут, к стенке поставят и все тут!" {n}Солдат понуро опускает голову, смиряясь с судьбой.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Why, what did I do? Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship, they won't even bother to look into the matter, they'll just march me to the wall and shoot me!" {n}The soldier lowers his head glumly, accepting his fate.{/n}

"Why, what did I do? Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship, they won't even bother to look into the matter, they'll just march me to the wall and shoot me!" {n}The soldier lowers his head glumly, accepting his fate.{/n}

languages.text: "Warum, was habe ich getan? Euer {mf|Lord|Lady}schaft, sie werden sich nicht einmal die Mühe machen, die Angelegenheit zu untersuchen, sie werden mich einfach an die Wand stellen und erschießen!" {n}Der Soldat senkt düster den Kopf. Er akzeptiert sein Schicksal.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Why, what did I do? Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship, they won't even bother to look into the matter, they'll just march me to the wall and shoot me!" {n}The soldier lowers his head glumly, accepting his fate.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Warum, was habe ich getan? Euer {mf|Lord|Lady}schaft, sie werden sich nicht einmal die Mühe machen, die Angelegenheit zu untersuchen, sie werden mich einfach an die Wand stellen und erschießen!" {n}Der Soldat senkt düster den Kopf. Er akzeptiert sein Schicksal.{/n}

languages.text: « Pourquoi ? Qu'est-ce que j'ai fait ? Votre Seigneurie, ils ne se donneront même pas la peine de se pencher sur la question. Ils se contenteront de me placer devant un mur et de me fusiller ! » {n}Le soldat baisse la tête d'un air morose, acceptant son sort.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Why, what did I do? Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship, they won't even bother to look into the matter, they'll just march me to the wall and shoot me!" {n}The soldier lowers his head glumly, accepting his fate.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Pourquoi ? Qu'est-ce que j'ai fait ? Votre Seigneurie, ils ne se donneront même pas la peine de se pencher sur la question. Ils se contenteront de me placer devant un mur et de me fusiller ! » {n}Le soldat baisse la tête d'un air morose, acceptant son sort.{/n}

languages.text: “什么？可我做了什么？大人，恐怕他们根本不打算仔细调查。他们只会把我赶到墙边，然后毙了我！”{n}士兵沮丧地低下了头，准备认命了。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Why, what did I do? Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship, they won't even bother to look into the matter, they'll just march me to the wall and shoot me!" {n}The soldier lowers his head glumly, accepting his fate.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “什么？可我做了什么？大人，恐怕他们根本不打算仔细调查。他们只会把我赶到墙边，然后毙了我！”{n}士兵沮丧地低下了头，准备认命了。{/n}

languages.text: 「なぜだ、私が何をしたと言うんだ？陛下、彼らはこの件を調査することなく、ただ私を壁に向かわせて撃つだけだろう！」{n}兵士は暗い表情で頭を下げ、運命を受け入れる。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Why, what did I do? Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship, they won't even bother to look into the matter, they'll just march me to the wall and shoot me!" {n}The soldier lowers his head glumly, accepting his fate.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「なぜだ、私が何をしたと言うんだ？{mf|陛下|陛下}、彼らはこの件を調査することなく、ただ私を壁に向かわせて撃つだけだろう！」{n}兵士は暗い表情で頭を下げ、運命を受け入れる。{/n}

languages.text: «¿Por qué, qué he hecho? Mi{mf|lord|lady}, ni siquiera se molestarán en investigar el asunto, ¡simplemente me llevarán al paredón y me fusilarán!». {n}El soldado baja la cabeza desanimado, aceptando su destino.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Why, what did I do? Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship, they won't even bother to look into the matter, they'll just march me to the wall and shoot me!" {n}The soldier lowers his head glumly, accepting his fate.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «¿Por qué, qué he hecho? Mi{mf|lord|lady}, ni siquiera se molestarán en investigar el asunto, ¡simplemente me llevarán al paredón y me fusilarán!». {n}El soldado baja la cabeza desanimado, aceptando su destino.{/n}

languages.text: "Niye, ne yaptım ki? {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri, konuyu soruşturmaya bile tenezzül etmezler! Beni bir duvara dayayıp kurşuna dizerler!" {n}Asker kasvetle başını öne eğip kaderini kabulleniyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Why, what did I do? Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship, they won't even bother to look into the matter, they'll just march me to the wall and shoot me!" {n}The soldier lowers his head glumly, accepting his fate.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Niye, ne yaptım ki? {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri, konuyu soruşturmaya bile tenezzül etmezler! Beni bir duvara dayayıp kurşuna dizerler!" {n}Asker kasvetle başını öne eğip kaderini kabulleniyor.{/n}
